title: New: Osca – Illume
body:
Anyone watching last nights latest humiliation of Man Utd.

will probably have heard **Osca** soundtracking the closing credits, accompanied by numerous shots of a very glum looking van Gaal. With their debut track, _Blood_, reaching the Sky Sports audience, they’ve released their second offering, in the form of the equally anthemic _Illume_. So there’s perhaps more than a hint of Coldplay to them, but hey, what’s wrong with ambition? Perhaps Rooney & co. could do with a little more…
